attributes.additional_details:
Season 8 is the first not to be 'certified fresh' from esteemed ratings aggregator Rotten Tomatoes: https://www.rottentomatoes.com/tv/game-of-thrones
Every previous season received a rating in the 90s, whereas season 8 is at 71, and will likely fall from there shortly after the finale.

Likewise, on IMDB, Season 8 is the first to have even a single episode rate lower than 8, and the season will likely average in the high 6s, rather than the low 9s for every other season.
attributes.background: Game of Thrones Season 8 has been offensively bad and has ruined the development of at least Seasons 1 through 6. Since the show completely left the books, the writing has become awful, and the show deserves a better ending.
